ul.li: Primary disk (vmdisk1, SCSI 0:0): Default is 150 GB
Data disk (vmdisk2, SCSI 0:1): Default is 2 TB
Swap disk (vmdisk3, SCSI 0:2): Default is 40 GB

conbody.p: If you deploy this type of data server, you must also deploy an Elasticsearch cluster with at least one node. If you deploy a cluster with more nodes, each of the Elasticsearch nodes must meet the listed requirements.
